abstract: Berkshire Hathaway has agreed to buy the 20 percent of the IMC International Metalworking Companies that it does not already own for $2.05 billion.
snippet: Berkshire Hathaway has agreed to buy the 20 percent of the IMC International Metalworking Companies that it does not already own for $2.05 billion.
lead_paragraph: Berkshire Hathaway has agreed to buy the 20 percent of the IMC International Metalworking Companies that it does not already own for $2.05 billion, giving it full control of the company.

headline.main: Berkshire Hathaway to Acquire the Rest of IMC for $2 Billion

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
